anya-e1009n:67: Vīriyavato kiṃ nāma kammaṃ na sijjhati;
anya-e1009n:349_0: 64. Cattārome bhikkhave dhammā paññāvuddhiyā saṃvattanti. Katame cattāro. Sappurisasaṃsevo
anya-e1009n:349_1: saddhammasavanaṃ yoniso manasikāro dhammānudhamma-paṭipatti. Ime kho bhikkhave cattāro
anya-e1009n:707: Yaṃ na vade na taṃ kare;
anya-e1009n:1210: A-satī ca sā so pana mittaṃ-dubbho,
anya-e1009n:1218_0: 235. Pañcime bhikkhave dhammā āyussā, katame pañca. Sappāya-kārī hoti. Sappāyeca
anya-e1009n:1218_1: mattaṃ jānāti. Pariṇattabhojī ca hoti. Kāla-cārī ca, brahma-cārīca. Ime kho bhikkhave
anya-e1009n:1219_0: 236. Pañcime bhikkhave dhammā āyussā, katame pañca. Sappāya-kārī hoti. Sappāyeca
anya-e1009n:1219_1: mattaṃ jānāti. Pariṇatabhojīcahoti. Sīlavāca, kalyāṇa mittoca. Ime kho bhikkhave
anya-e1009n:1225_0: 238. Pañcime bhikkhave caṅkame ānisaṃsā, katame pañca, addhānakkhamo hoti. Padhānakkhamo
anya-e1009n:1225_1: hoti. Appābādho hoti. Asitaṃpītaṃkhāyitaṃsāyitaṃ sammā pariṇāmaṃ gacchati. Caṅkamādhigato
anya-e1009n:1225_2: samādhi ciraṭṭhitiko hoti. Imekho bhikkhave pañca caṅkame āni saṃsāti.
